translations.chinese: 關中大飢，米斛萬錢，人相食。
translations.english: Guanzhong suffered great famine. Rice cost 10,000 cash per bushel. People ate each other.
He ordered the people to go to Shu and Han for food.

translations.chinese: 秋八月，漢王如滎陽，謂酈食其曰：「緩頰往說魏王豹，能下之，以魏地萬戶封生。」
translations.english: In the eighth month of autumn, King Han went to Xingyang and said to Li Yiji: "Go slowly to persuade King Wei Bao. If you can make him submit, I will enfeoff you with 10,000 households from Wei territory."
Li Yiji went, but Bao did not listen.

translations.chinese: 漢王以韓信為左丞相，與曹參、灌嬰俱擊魏。
translations.english: King Han appointed Han Xin as left chancellor, and together with Cao Can and Guan Ying attacked Wei.
